bot_intro: Hi, I'm Agentforce, an AI agent that can answer your Salesforce questions and connect you with our Sales Experts. This experience, powered entirely by Agentforce, keeps improving daily! Ask me things like, 'Can I chat with a Sales Expert?' or 'What is CRM?'
bot_buttons: Connect me with a sales rep
How can Salesforce help my business
demo_response: You can watch the demo for Agentforce here.
error_response: Sorry, I couldn't process that. Please try again.
default_reply: Sorry, I could not get a response.
header_info: This tool uses generative AI, which can produce inaccurate or harmful responses. Learn more.
